ISSUE.TITLE: Server creation in RTL locales results in mojibake server names
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ![Screenshot from 2021-06-21 16-57-58](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/191945/122827722-ba819c00-d2b2-11eb-912c-b57fea76b43e.png) I expect this is happening because the DigitalOcean droplet "user_data" field is not fully unicode-safe. (The Outline server creation request appears to be well-formed.) It's possible that DigitalOcean is taking the JSON value in UTF-16 and piping it directly to bash, which expects UTF-8.
